title: Internet Sensation Ranu Mondal Wins Hearts Again As She Croons 'Tujhe Dekha Toh' From DDLJ!
text:
Internet sensation Ranu Mondal became an internet sensation after being discovered singing Ek Pyaar Ka Nagma Hai at the Ranaghat Railway Station. She keeps winning the internet every now and then, thanks to her talent.

It was after her songs were uploaded by 26-year-old Atindra Choudhary that she became instantly viral. She was also called on a reality show to sing. The judge of the show Himesh Reshammiya was impressed to an extent that she was offered her a chance to record three songs for his film Happy Hardy and Heer.

She went on to sing songs including Teri Meri Kahani, Aadat and Aashiqui Mein Teri 2.0. Teri Meri Kahani. And now, she is making news again after she appeared on a reality show called Comedy Stars. She crooned a hit track from 1995 film Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge called Tujhe Dekha Toh Yeh Jaana Sanam.

Don't Miss 49.2 K SHARES 8 K SHARES 21.9 K SHARES 8.8 K SHARES 3.8 K SHARES





Originally sung by her idol Lata Mangeshkar and Kumar Sanu, the video went viral on the internet and has over 20,000 views .
description: Internet sensation Ranu Mondal became an internet sensation after being discovered singing Ek Pyaar Ka Nagma Hai at the Ranaghat Railway Station. She keeps winning the internet every now and then, thanks to her talent. It was after her songs were uploaded by 26-year-old Atindra Choudhary that she became instantly viral.
